content: *hexagon-shaped motifs are arranged to create an explosion of color in this month s crochet project add warmth and texture to any room with the galaxy afghan * hexagon-shaped motifs are arranged to create an explosion of color in this month s crochet project add warmth and texture to any room with the galaxy afghan afghan measures approximately 53 by 77 materials 4-ply worsted weight yarn-- color a light yellow 3 5 ozs b medium yellow 3 5 ozs c peach 3 5 ozs d salmon 3 5 ozs e mauve 7 ozs f violet 7 ozs g light pink 7 ozs h dark pink 7 ozs i light turquoise 10 5 ozs j dark turquoise 17 5 ozs k royal blue 17 5 ozs l purple 17 5 ozs crochet hook size j-10 6 mm or size to obtain gauge size i-9 5 1/2 mm or size to obtain gauge yarn needle for finishing gauge motif = 6 from point to point
